sqlMap.select: select modification_num typeCode from fa_modification where modification_num like concat('%', #value#, '%') order by modification_num desc

select id faModificationId, info_id faInfoId, goods_num goodsNum, goods_name goodsName, goods_classify_code goodsClassifyCode, goods_classify_name goodsClassifyName, goods_type_code goodsTypeCode, goods_type_name goodsTypeName, rfid_code rfidCode, model, unit_num unitNum, unit_name unitName, dept_num deptNum, dept_name deptName, manufacturer, surp_num surpNum, surp_name surpName, DATE_FORMAT( buy_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) buyDate, DATE_FORMAT( use_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) useDate, DATE_FORMAT( in_account_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) inAccountDate, finace_class_num finaceClassNum, invoice_no invoiceNo, DATE_FORMAT( invoice_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) invoiceDate, build, floor, install_location_num installLocationNum, install_location installLocation, use_years useYears, amount, price, buy_cost buyCost, residual_rate residualRate, estimated_residual_value estimatedResidualValue, net_asset_value netAssetValue, estimate_cost estimateCost, depreciation_way depreciationWay, total_depreciation totalDepreciation, month_depreciation monthDepreciation, status_code as "statusCode", CASE status_code WHEN '01' THEN '待审批' WHEN '02' THEN '审批通过' END AS "statusCodeMean", fundingSource_num as "fundingSourceNum", modification_num modificationNum, rec_creator recCreateName, DATE_FORMAT( rec_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) recCreateTime, remark, change_reason changeReason from fa_modification
status_code = "01"
info_id = #faInfoId#
modification_num = #modificationNum#
order by goods_num
sqlMap.update: UPDATE fa_modification SET goods_num = #goodsNum#, goods_name = #goodsName#, goods_classify_code = #goodsClassifyCode#, goods_classify_name = #goodsClassifyName#, goods_type_code = #goodsTypeCode#, goods_type_name = #goodsTypeName#, rfid_code = #rfidCode#, model = #model#, unit_num = #unitNum#, unit_name = #unitName#, dept_num = #deptNum#, dept_name = #deptName#, manufacturer = #manufacturer#, surp_name = #surpName#, buy_date = #buyDate#, use_date = #useDate#, build = #build#, floor = #floor#, install_location_num = #installLocationNum#, install_location = #installLocation#, use_years = #useYears#, amount = #amount#, price = #price#, buy_cost = #buyCost#, residual_rate = #residualRate#, estimated_residual_value = #estimatedResidualValue#, net_asset_value = #netAssetValue#, estimate_cost = #estimateCost#, fundingSource_num = #fundingSourceNum#, in_account_date = #inAccountDate#, remark = #remark#, total_depreciation = #totalDepreciation#, month_depreciation = #monthDepreciation#, status_code = "02" where info_id = #faInfoId# and status_code = "01"
sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fa_info WHERE lock_flag NOT IN ("4")
status_code = "020" AND lock_flag = '0'
status_code = "020" AND lock_flag = '2'
lock_flag = "0" and in_account_status = "1" and status_code in ("20","30")
lock_flag not in ("2","4") and status_code in ("20","30")
status_code in ("20","30")
id = #faInfoId#
goods_num like concat ('%',trim(#goodsNum#),'%')
goods_name like concat ('%',trim(#goodsName#),'%')
surp_name like concat ('%',trim(#surpName#),'%')
remark like concat ('%',trim(#remark#),'%')
use_years = #useYear#
buy_cost >= #buyCostS#
#buyCostE# >= buy_cost
net_asset_value >= #netAssetValueS#
#netAssetValueE# >= net_asset_value
DATE_FORMAT( buy_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #buyDateS#
#buyDateE# >= DATE_FORMAT( buy_date, '%Y-%m-%d' )
DATE_FORMAT( use_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #useDateS#
#useDateE# >= DATE_FORMAT( use_date, '%Y-%m-%d' )
goods_classify_name like concat ('%',trim(#goodsClassifyCode#),'%')
goods_type_name like concat ('%',trim(#goodsTypeCode#),'%')
dept_name like concat ('%',trim(#deptName#),'%')
fundingSource_num = #fundingSourceNum#

SELECT id, id AS "faInfoId", cont_no AS "contNo", goods_num AS "goodsNum", goods_name AS "goodsName", goods_classify_code AS "goodsClassifyCode", goods_classify_name AS "goodsClassifyName", goods_type_code AS "goodsTypeCode", goods_type_name AS "goodsTypeName", model AS "model", amount AS "amount", price AS "price", buy_cost AS "buyCost", manufacturer AS "manufacturer", surp_name AS "surpName", DATE_FORMAT( buy_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS "buyDate", DATE_FORMAT( use_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS "useDate", build AS "build", floor AS "floor", room AS "room", install_location AS "installLocation", install_location_num AS "installLocationNum", dept_num AS "deptNum", dept_name AS "deptName", CASE status_code WHEN '010' THEN '待用' WHEN '020' THEN '在用' WHEN '030' THEN '现场停用' WHEN '050' THEN '预报废' WHEN '060' THEN '报废' END AS "statusCode", unit_num AS "unitNum", unit_name AS "unitName", residual_rate AS "residualRate", estimated_residual_value AS "estimatedResidualValue", use_years AS "useYears", fundingSource_num AS "fundingSourceNum", finace_class_num AS "finaceClassNum", DATE_FORMAT( in_account_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS "inAccountDate", invoice_no AS "invoiceNo", DATE_FORMAT( invoice_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS "invoiceDate", device_id AS "deviceId", device_name AS "deviceName", device_type_name AS "deviceTypeName", rfid_code AS "rfidCode", net_asset_value AS "netAssetValue", estimate_cost AS "estimateCost", remark AS "remark", depreciation_way AS "depreciationWay", total_depreciation AS "totalDepreciation", month_depreciation AS "monthDepreciation", in_account_status AS "inAccountStatus", card_status AS "cardStatus", rec_creator AS "recCreator", rec_create_name AS "recCreateName", DATE_FORMAT( rec_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS "recCreateTime", rec_revisor AS "recRevisor", rec_revise_name AS "recReviseName", DATE_FORMAT( rec_revise_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS "recReviseTime", data_group_code AS "dataGroupCode", lock_flag AS "lockFlag", archive_flag AS "archiveFlag", split_reason AS "splitReason" FROM fa_info WHERE lock_flag NOT IN ("4")
status_code = "020" AND lock_flag = '0'
status_code = "020" AND lock_flag = '2'
lock_flag = "0" and in_account_status = "1" and status_code in ("20","30")
lock_flag not in ("2","4") and status_code in ("20","30")
status_code in ("20","30")
id = #faInfoId#
goods_num like concat ('%',trim(#goodsNum#),'%')
goods_name like concat ('%',trim(#goodsName#),'%')
surp_name like concat ('%',trim(#surpName#),'%')
remark like concat ('%',trim(#remark#),'%')
use_years = #useYear#
buy_cost >= #buyCostS#
#buyCostE# >= buy_cost
net_asset_value >= #netAssetValueS#
#netAssetValueE# >= net_asset_value
DATE_FORMAT( buy_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #buyDateS#
#buyDateE# >= DATE_FORMAT( buy_date, '%Y-%m-%d' )
DATE_FORMAT( use_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #useDateS#
#useDateE# >= DATE_FORMAT( use_date, '%Y-%m-%d' )
goods_classify_name like concat ('%',trim(#goodsClassifyCode#),'%')
goods_type_name like concat ('%',trim(#goodsTypeCode#),'%')
dept_name like concat ('%',trim(#deptName#),'%')
fundingSource_num = #fundingSourceNum#
order by dept_name,rec_revise_time DESC,rec_create_time DESC,LENGTH(goods_num),goods_num
sqlMap.update: UPDATE fa_info set lock_flag = '2' WHERE id = #id# AND lock_flag = '0' AND status_code = '20'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT UUID() AS "id", id AS "faInfoId", goods_num AS "goodsNum", goods_name AS "goodsName", contract_no AS "contractNo", goods_classify_code AS "goodsClassifyCode", goods_classify_name AS "goodsClassifyName", goods_type_code AS "goodsTypeCode", goods_type_name AS "goodsTypeName", model, spec, price, buy_cost AS "buyCost", manufacturer, surp_name AS "surpName", buy_date AS "buyDate", use_date AS "useDate", build, floor, install_location_num AS "installLocationNum", install_location AS "installLocation", dept_num AS "deptNum", dept_name AS "deptName", unit_name AS "unitName", residual_rate AS "residualRate", net_asset_value AS "netAssetValue", estimated_residual_value AS "estimatedResidualValue", use_years AS "useYears", fundingSource_num AS "fundingSourceNum", fundingSource_name AS "fundingSourceName", asset_use_code as "assetUseCode", asset_use_name as "assetUseName", asset_get_way_code as "assetGetWayCode", asset_get_way_name as "assetGetWayName", finace_class_num AS "finaceClassNum", invoice_no AS "invoiceNo", estimate_cost AS "estimateCost", remark, modify_type AS "modifyType" FROM fa_info WHERE id IN
#idsList[]#

SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT id, faInfo_id AS "faInfoId", goods_num AS "goodsNum", goods_name AS "goodsName", contract_no AS "contractNo", goods_classify_code AS "goodsClassifyCode", goods_classify_name AS "goodsClassifyName", goods_type_code AS "goodsTypeCode", goods_type_name AS "goodsTypeName", model, price, buy_cost AS "buyCost", manufacturer, surp_name AS "surpName", buy_date AS "buyDate", use_date AS "useDate", build, floor, install_location_num AS "installLocationNum", install_location AS "installLocation", dept_num AS "deptNum", dept_name AS "deptName", unit_name AS "unitName", residual_rate AS "residualRate", estimated_residual_value AS "estimatedResidualValue", use_years AS "useYears", fundingSource_num AS "fundingSourceNum", finace_class_num AS "finaceClassNum", invoice_no AS "invoiceNo", estimate_cost AS "estimateCost", remark, modify_type AS "modifyType" FROM fa_modification_batch_detail WHERE faInfo_id IN
#idsList[]#
HAVING 1 ORDER BY REC_CREATE_TIME DESC) a GROUP BY a.faInfoId
sqlMap.update: UPDATE fa_info SET goods_num = #goodsNum#, goods_name = #goodsName#, goods_classify_code = #goodsClassifyCode#, goods_classify_name = #goodsClassifyName#, goods_type_code = #goodsTypeCode#, goods_type_name = #goodsTypeName#, model = #model#, spec = #spec#, unit_num = #unitNum#, unit_name = #unitName#, manufacturer = #manufacturer#, surp_num = #surpNum#, surp_name = #surpName#, asset_use_code = #assetUseCode#, asset_use_name = #assetUseName#, asset_get_way_code = #assetGetWayCode#, asset_get_way_name = #assetGetWayName#, manufacturer_naty_code = #manufacturerNatyCode#, manufacturer_naty_name = #manufacturerNatyName#, buy_date = #buyDate#, use_date = #useDate#, build = #build#, floor = #floor#, room = #room#, install_location_num = #installLocationNum#, install_location = #installLocation#, use_years = #useYears#, price = #price#, buy_cost = #buyCost#, residual_rate = #residualRate#, estimated_residual_value = #estimatedResidualValue#, estimate_cost = #estimateCost#, net_asset_value = #netAssetValue#, fundingSource_num = #fundingSourceNum#, fundingSource_name = #fundingSourceName#, remark = #remark#, lock_flag = '0', modify_type = #modifyType# WHERE id = #faInfoId#
UPDATE fa_modification_batch_detail SET approval_result = '10' WHERE approval_result = '00' AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT id,faInfo_id FROM fa_modification_batch_detail WHERE faInfo_id IN
#idsList[]#
HAVING 1 ORDER BY REC_CREATE_TIME DESC ) a GROUP BY a.faInfo_id
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE fa_modification_batch_detail SET approval_result = '20' WHERE approval_result = '00' AND id IN
#lastIdList[]#

UPDATE fa_info SET lock_flag = '0' WHERE lock_flag = '2' AND status_code = '20' AND id IN
#idsList[]#
sqlMap.select: SELECT t1.`id`, t1.`faInfo_id` AS "faInfoId", t1.`key`, t1.`label`, t1.`previous`, t1.`later`, date_format(t1.`time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS "time", t2.rec_create_name AS "recCreateName", t2.change_reason AS "changeReason" FROM fa_modification_record t1 LEFT JOIN fa_modification_batch_detail t2 ON t1.batch_id = t2.id WHERE t1.faInfo_id = #VALUE# ORDER BY `time` DESC,LENGTH(label)

SELECT faInfo_id AS "faInfoId", cont_no AS "contNo", goods_num AS "goodsNum", goods_name AS "goodsName", goods_classify_code AS "goodsClassifyCode", goods_classify_name AS "goodsClassifyName", goods_type_code AS "goodsTypeCode", goods_type_name AS "goodsTypeName", dept_name AS "deptName" FROM fa_modification_batch_detail WHERE 1=1
goods_num like concat ('%',trim(#goodsNum#),'%')
goods_name like concat ('%',trim(#goodsName#),'%')
goods_classify_code = #goodsClassifyCode#
goods_type_code = #goodsTypeCode#
dept_name like concat ('%',trim(#deptName#),'%')
GROUP BY goods_num
